abilities.name: Stalwart
abilities.description: Chance to survive when reduced to zero health

abilities.name: HighRoller
abilities.description: Chance to double any roll

abilities.name: Vampirism
abilities.description: Chance to sap health on hit

abilities.name: Heroic
abilities.description: Increases roll when on low health

abilities.name: LuckyHorseshoe
abilities.description: Increases luck

abilities.name: HealthyDiet
abilities.description: Increases max health

abilities.name: Procrastination
abilities.description: Alternate between high and low rolls

abilities.name: Spiky
abilities.description: Chance to deal recoil damage when hit by an enemy

abilities.name: Recovery
abilities.description: Heal after battles

abilities.name: Venomous
abilities.description: Chance to inflict poison on hit

abilities.name: CarePackage
abilities.description: Restore all health immediately

abilities.name: HighStamina
abilities.description: Reduces all tech cooldowns by 2

abilities.name: Contagious
abilities.description: Chance to debuff enemy when hit

abilities.name: Snowball
abilities.description: Reduces tech cooldown by 2 when that tech hits successfully

abilities.name: Skilled
abilities.description: All techs get an extra +1 max roll

abilities.name: LifeDrain
abilities.description: All techs restore player health by 1 on hit

abilities.name: OverwhelmingSpeed
abilities.description: Using techs consecutively increases roll

abilities.name: ThickSkin
abilities.description: Reduces roll damage taken by 1 (can't reduce below 1)

abilities.name: Retaliation
abilities.description: Decreases active tech cooldowns when dealt roll damage

abilities.name: Overkill
abilities.description: Deals 3 extra damage when the player rolls at least 5 more than the enemy

abilities.name: Taunting
abilities.description: Chance to enrage enemy on hit

abilities.name: Patience
abilities.description: Raises roll the longer a battle lasts

abilities.name: Relic
abilities.description: Receive a random ultrarare weapon
